message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a great deal, and I know you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm interested in the product, but I have to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I can't go that low. I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let's see if we can strike a deal.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I can do $9,800, and that's as low as I can go. I'm really interested in the product, so I hope we can meet in the middle.
